SQL_STMT_U.val: select distinct LGCD_ADMNO, LGCD_LDGR_NO, LGCD_LGCH_ID, LGCD_LINENO, LGCD_VALUEDATE, cast((LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)), LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK,LGCD_DESCRIPTION from :1/LGCD join :1/BANK on LGCD_LDGR_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES join :1/ADMU on LGCD_ADMNO = ADMU_ADMNO where :2 LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and LGCD_DATE > ':4' and (LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT <> 0 or LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT <> 0) and cast((LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)) < 0 and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':3' and ADMU_ALLOW_MODIFY_LEDGER = 'Y' FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: This program uses "force record delete" condition
Program handled/delete only one row per call (end task condition : YES/after)
if LGCD_LGCH_ID=0 delete record, otherwise set LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK='Y'
(this program delete and update only the credit rows. The debit rows
will be deleted/updated in tasks 'Update LGCD'/'Delete LGCD')
